Hi John,

Many thanks for the input. I am aware of the sanjo in boston but I don't 
have the book and cannot find a way in on line. Any chance that you could 
send me a copy of the scan of your sword or the one in boston if you have a 
copy?

best regards and good luck with yours.

Roger

At 03:12 p.m. 05-04-05 +0000, you wrote:

>hi roger
>   there is an example of sanjo yoshinori mei in the boston museum book if 
> you have it.i have a sanjo being polished at this time which i have high 
> hopes for.a scan of my mei which matches up with the boston signature 
> very well was sent to tanabe a while back and he said it looked to be 
> fine so i have high hopes.
>
>
>john
